website_summaries.verdict: This launcher delivers on the promise to launch 400 yd.
pros: Can launch other small items like pumpkins, balls, and vegetables
cons: A great launcher, but it really requires 2 adults or larger children to hold and launch

customer_reviews.title: Mabye for a professional...
customer_reviews.text: Interesting concept but was not easy to use with kids. Professional balloon launch workers could probably get the long distances, but for the average family use it was disappointing
customer_reviews.author: M. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Toooo much AWESOMNESS!
customer_reviews.text: Used it to launch small pumpkins, potatoes and lemons at school for an assembly, giving the kids a chance to experiment with Newton's 3 Laws! It was awesome! That produce flew an average of 400 feet; across a full-size basketball court, over the soccer field, and out to the baseball backstops! Wooooweeee!
customer_reviews.author: Professional online shopper! :)

customer_reviews.title: Kids and family friendly!
customer_reviews.text: We used this one the other day for a 5 yr. old birthday party. As long as the kids pull it down almost straight and the adults hold the cords up straight, it will launch high and comeback down maybe 30ft - 80 ft. Away.
customer_reviews.author: Gremal

customer_reviews.title: Intial impression is impressive
customer_reviews.text: The sling shot is made of durable materials. I haven't got to fully test the distance; but lacking a strong trio for this, I am going to make a platform to get the max out of this sling. Came with a nice pouch for storage and a bag of water balloons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super!
customer_reviews.text: It worked fantastically! The kids at the school carnival loved competing for the longest distance! The adults got a workout too holding the ends. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen L. Gaydos

customer_reviews.title: WOW !
customer_reviews.text: This thing takes a backyard BBQ to a whole new level ! We were sending water balloons out of sight ! Launched a lemon to the next county ! Can't imagine how far a golf ball would fly !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Captain Splash---Awesomeness at it's finest!!!
customer_reviews.text: Captain Splash went above & beyond our expectations!! I would definitely buy from them again in the future. Their customer service is beyond extraordinary and I will tell everyone I know!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: strong but less fun
customer_reviews.text: for strong people only,but works great - had to get out old easier pull sling for younger-smaller kids
customer_reviews.author: james denhoff

customer_reviews.title: but the fun it provides might just be
customer_reviews.text: Material did not seem worth the $30...but the fun it provides might just be! Tbd...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, service and delivery! We love our new water balloon launcher!
customer_reviews.author: Scott & Sarah

customer_reviews.title: This product was okay because there is no way a ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is just okay because there is no way a balloon will launch 400 yards. maybe 150 yards at the most/
customer_reviews.author: Letty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for our first event. Quality is very good
customer_reviews.author: Scott Frieler

customer_reviews.title: Can hardly wait!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet,but the intendant recipients are very excited about the idea Was the hit of the party.Kids of all ages loved it.It confirmed my Matriarchood of my vast clan!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Roberta Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: My boys absolutely love it! It launches the balloons a long way. They have played with it nonstop since they got it. I received this at a discount for a honest review.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lighthall

customer_reviews.title: Awesome water balloon launcher
customer_reviews.text: Great launcher! Bought this for my nephew at his birthday request. It works better than advertised. Nice strong tension and it really launches the balloons!
customer_reviews.author: Kaymue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift for Young Teenage Nephews
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect Christmas gift for my young teenage nephews. They love it! It's great that it comes with balloons so they're able to use it right out of the box. I received this product at a discount in exchange for an honest review.
customer_reviews.author: Jake B.

product_meta.title: Water Balloon Launcher 400 Yards by Captain Splash, 3 Person Slingshot Cannon Catapult, 150 FREE Water Balloons & Carry Case Included. (Black, Extra Strong Latex Sling) 2019 Edition. Outdoor Games
product_meta.description:
Details 

 ✔ Captain Splash 400 Yard Water Balloon Launcher is made from extremely durable latex, real surgical tubing and rip-proof nylon and foam comfort grip handles. 

 ✔ The carry case is made of quality nylon and double stitched. 

 ✔ 150 multicolored water balloons included. 

 ✔ Can launch water balloons, snowballs and other soft and light promotional items up to 400 yards. 

 ✔ Hassle free Money-Back Guarantee. Recommended for children 16 years or older. 

 If using around small children, keep safety in mind. The instructions to use the launcher may seem easy, but there is a small learning curve. It will take some practice before being able to launch incredible distances. 

 How to Use 

 At least 3 people are needed to be able to use the launcher. Fill up water balloons to about the size of a tennis ball. This will insure that the balloon does not burst when letting go of the pouch during launch. 

 Two players stand three feet apart facing their target, each grasping one of the vinyl grips with their inside hand. A third player (launcher) will then load the water balloon into the pouch with one hand holding the nylon handle and the other hand cupping the balloon into the pouch. The launcher will then pull back (no further than eight feet), aim at the target and let go. Never aim at eye level. 

 Tip: Once you fill your water balloons, leave them in a bucket of water, since Water Balloon Launcher Balloons are constructed to break easier to avoid injuries. 

 Captain Splash Water Balloon Launchers will have you winning every water balloon fight, or snowball fight. Amaze with accuracy and monster distances.
feature_bullets: 💦 CERTIFIED AWESOME: The Captain Splash 400 Yard Water Balloon Launcher hurtles balloons high into the sky and beyond the great expanses!
💦 150 BALLOONS INCLUDED: Pull back the sling and let these multicolored balloons cut through the air.
💦 CARRY CASE INCLUDED: Comes with a compact and handy nylon Carrying Case and instructions.
💦 STURDY AS AN OX: Made to last with real surgical tubing and rip-proof nylon and foam comfort grip handles.
💦 LIFETIME GUARANTEE: Hassle free Money-Back Guarantee. Recommended for children 16 years or older.
